CustomField.description: Active - Event has registrations that still need to be billed out. Submitted to Finance - All billings have been sent down to finance, and the event can now be reconciled. Reconciled - Finance has checked the General Ledger against the registrations for the event and made any adjustments.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Active - Event has registrations that still need to be billed out. Submitted to Finance - All billings have been sent down to finance, and the event can now be reconciled. Reconciled - Finance has checked the General Ledger against the registrations.
CustomField.label: Reconciliation Status
